content: Yes, technicians in the mechanical and electrical industries often undergo training to become familiar with the regulations and codes that govern their work. Many technical schools and vocational programs offer courses on codes and standards, and some employers may provide additional training to their employees. Additionally, certification and licensing programs in these industries often require knowledge of codes and regulations as part of the certification or licensure process. It is important for technicians to stay up-to-date with changes to codes and regulations as they can impact the safety and effectiveness of their work.
